normal.speaker: Land
normal.line: I'm Land the Lancer. Call me anytime you need the help.

normal.speaker: Land
normal.line: Please, it's *Land the Lancer*. My title is important!!

normal.speaker: Land
normal.line: Me and my horse, we're a package deal. We are the strongest buddy in the universe!

normal.speaker: Land
normal.line: I'm telling you, 'Land the Lancer' just sounds heroic. It's great, right?

normal.speaker: Land
normal.line: Did you know lances are the coolest? And you can use them on a horse!

taunt.speaker: Land
taunt.line: Did you just call me Land without the Lancer? That's unforgivable.

taunt.speaker: Land
taunt.line: I became a lancer because it’s the path to true power... and horses are awesome.

taunt.speaker: Land
taunt.line: You won’t understand the weight of my name, this is my legacy!

taunt.speaker: Land
taunt.line: Prepare to be... lanced! By Land! The Lancer!
